mapper.select: SELECT p.phone, p.card_num FROM b_person AS p where p.id = #{perId}
SELECT p.id AS perId, p.card_photoz AS imageUrlZ, p.card_photof AS imageUrlF FROM b_person AS p WHERE p.id = #{perId}

SELECT r.type, r.reason, (SELECT meaning FROM c_code_value WHERE code_type = 'risk_source' AND code_code = r.sys) source, IF( r.handler_name <> '' ,r.handler_name,(SELECT user_name FROM c_system_user WHERE user_sysno = r.handler_no)) operator, r.create_time createTime FROM b_person p, risk.risk_blacklist_info_log r WHERE p.card_num = r.idcard AND p.id = #{perId} order by r.create_time desc

SELECT n.id AS id, b.node_name AS nodeName, n.node_status AS nodeStatus, ca.meaning AS nodeStatusName, n.description AS description, n.node_date AS nodeDate, n.update_date AS updateDate FROM dc_common.b_bpm_node n LEFT JOIN dc_common.c_bpm b ON n.node_id = b.id LEFT JOIN c_code_value ca ON n.node_status = ca.code_code AND ca.code_type = 'node_status' WHERE n.per_id = #{perId} ORDER BY n.node_id

SELECT mc.org_code orgCode, lvd.limitconfig_code limitconfigCode, add_value addValue, SUBSTRING_INDEX(remark,'【',1) remark, lvd.create_time createTime, expire_time expireTime, (SELECT SUM(add_value) FROM risk.risk_limit_value_detail WHERE idcard = #{idCard} AND product_id = 66
AND expire_time < SYSDATE()
AND expire_time > SYSDATE()
AND is_enable = 1 )score FROM risk.risk_limit_value_detail lvd LEFT JOIN risk.risk_limit_config mc ON mc.risk_code = lvd.limitconfig_code WHERE idcard = #{idCard} AND product_id = 66
AND expire_time < SYSDATE()
AND expire_time > SYSDATE()

SELECT t1.bank_name AS bankName , t1.bank_num AS bankNum , t1.phone AS bankPhone, DATE_FORMAT(t1.creation_date, '%Y/%m/%d') AS createDate, CASE status WHEN '1' THEN '主卡' WHEN '2' THEN '副卡' WHEN '0' THEN '无效卡' END AS status FROM b_bank t1 inner JOIN b_person t2 on t1.per_id=t2.id WHERE t2.id = #{perId}

select insert(phone, 4, 4, '****') as phone, '已注册' source, DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as createDate from b_person
and create_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createDate_start},'%Y-%m-%d')
and create_date < DATE_FORMAT(#{createDate_end},'%Y-%m-%d')
and source = #{source}
ORDER BY create_date desc
order by create_date
desc asc
SELECT code_code CODE , meaning VALUE FROM c_code_value WHERE code_type = #{code}
select p.card_num cardNum, p.phone from b_person p inner join b_borrow_list b on p.id = b.per_id where b.id = #{borrId}

SELECT id, username, password, phone, check_date, phone_business, phone_service, grade, is_login, token_id, source, inviter, create_date, update_date, sync, is_manual, description, card_num, name, sex, nation, birthday, address, office, start_date, end_date, card_photoz, card_photof, card_photod, card_photov, bank_name, bank_card, contact_url, contact_num, contact_date, balance FROM b_person WHERE phone = #{phone}
